984230.name: X Archetype
984230.description:
Far away, in the Black-eye galaxy There was a solar system called Iris. Terra, the Fifth from the star inhabited many life forms. One of which was the Terran's. They advanced in technology, but are a peaceful people. One day the other inhabitants became enraged and stormed the Terran cities. All Cities were ransacked, and the people put in cages. All except one town. A man named Xavier fought off the enraged beasts with his sheer might. Now with the help of one of the locals he saved, Kim (An expert in weapon technology) he sets out to free his brothers in bondage. This is the story of X, the Archetype!



DrCat (GOG.com)
The game looks quite difficult, but also balanced at the same time. Action-packed gameplay is quite fun and addictive.
984230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
